info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Berkshire, northeastern Columbia, northeastern Albany and Rensselaer Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pittsfield to near Nassau. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Troy, Pittsfield, East Greenbush, Cohoes, North Adams, Watervliet, Rensselaer, Nassau, Latham, Adams, Williamstown, Menands, Cheshire, Stephentown, Green Island, New Lebanon, Grafton, Berlin and Castleton-On-Hudson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 6. Interstate 787 between exits 3 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for western Massachusetts...east central New York...and southern Vermont.
